name: Gingerbread Spice Syrup
description: Be ready to make lattes in an instant by making syrup in advance. Store in a Cruet and refrigerate up to 10 days. Makes a wonderful foodie gift!
preparation:
1.  Whisk all ingredients in a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup with a Piano Wire Whisk.
  2. Cook over medium heat until reduced by about half, and syrup coats the back of a spoon. Store in a Cruet and refrigerate up to 10 days until ready to serve.
